availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Janie Kimbrell. Father of Nancy Kimbrell, Patsey Kimbrell, Hannah Kimbrell, Joseph Kimbrell, Richard Kimbrell, Ennis Kimbrell, John Kimbrell, Sally Kimbrell, and Mary Kimbrell. Farmer in Madison County in 1860. Sergeant, first sergeant, and first lieutenant in the 1st Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from August 16, 1861, to October 20, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, District 1, p. 105.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Glade Precinct, p. 17.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 18-19.
